CustomField.description: This field shows the Severity Level of each Risk or Issue in a color
CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF( OR( AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Probability__c, "High") , ISPICKVAL(Probability__c, "Medium-High") , ISPICKVAL(Probability__c, "Medium-Low") ) , ISPICKVAL(Impact__c, "High") ) , AND(ISPICKVAL(Probability__c, "High"),ISPICKVAL(Impact__c, "Medium")) ) , "/img/samples/light_red.gif", IF( OR( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Probability__c, "Medium-High") , ISPICKVAL(Probability__c, "Medium-Low") ) , ISPICKVAL(Impact__c, "Medium") ) , AND(ISPICKVAL(Probability__c, "Low"),ISPICKVAL(Impact__c, "High")) ) , "/img/samples/light_yellow.gif", IF( OR( AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Probability__c, "High") , ISPICKVAL(Probability__c, "Medium-High") , ISPICKVAL(Probability__c, "Medium-Low") , ISPICKVAL(Probability__c, "Low") ) , ISPICKVAL(Impact__c, "Low") ) , AND(ISPICKVAL(Probability__c, "Low"),ISPICKVAL(Impact__c, "Medium")) ) , "/img/samples/light_green.gif","/img/samples/light_red.gif" ))),"Risk Level")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field shows the Severity Level of each Risk or Issue in a color
CustomField.label: Severity Level
